languages.text: "Я прячу их там уже десять лет, и вполне успешно! Услугами крематория пользуются только богатейшие граждане, их мало, умирают они, к сожалению, не часто. Обычно я сбываю товар до того, как подоспеет следующий покойник. Но в этот раз не повезло. Помогите мне, умоляю!"

traits.locale_text: "Я прячу их там уже десять лет, и вполне успешно! Услугами крематория пользуются только богатейшие граждане, их мало, умирают они, к сожалению, не часто. Обычно я сбываю товар до того, как подоспеет следующий покойник. Но в этот раз не повезло. Помогите мне, умоляю!"

languages.text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"
languages.original_text: "Я прячу их там уже десять лет, и вполне успешно! Услугами крематория пользуются только богатейшие граждане, их мало, умирают они, к сожалению, не часто. Обычно я сбываю товар до того, как подоспеет следующий покойник. Но в этот раз не повезло. Помогите мне, умоляю!"

traits.locale_text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next goner arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

"I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next goner arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

"I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

languages.text: “这十年来，我一直把我的货物藏在炉子里。而且我得补充一点，从来都没发生过意外！只有最富有的公民才能承担得起火葬场的费用，但遗憾的是，富人并不会经常死亡。通常情况下，我会在下一具尸体运过来之前就把东西卖掉，但这次我实在是太不走运了。帮帮我吧，求您了！”
languages.original_text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

traits.locale_text: “这十年来，我一直把我的货物藏在炉子里。而且我得补充一点，从来都没发生过意外！只有最富有的公民才能承担得起火葬场的费用，但遗憾的是，富人并不会经常死亡。通常情况下，我会在下一具尸体运过来之前就把东西卖掉，但这次我实在是太不走运了。帮帮我吧，求您了！”

languages.text: «Llevo escondiéndolos ahí diez años, ¡y sin ningún problema! Solo los ciudadanos más ricos pueden permitirse los servicios de un crematorio y por desgracia no suelen morir muchos. Normalmente vendo el producto antes de que llegue el siguiente cadáver. Pero esta vez la suerte me ha fallado. ¡Ayúdeme, se lo ruego!».
languages.original_text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

traits.locale_text: «Llevo escondiéndolos ahí diez años, ¡y sin ningún problema! Solo los ciudadanos más ricos pueden permitirse los servicios de un crematorio y por desgracia no suelen morir muchos. Normalmente vendo el producto antes de que llegue el siguiente cadáver. Pero esta vez la suerte me ha fallado. ¡Ayúdeme, se lo ruego!».

languages.text: 「ここ10年程あの中に商品を隠しています。今のところまったく気づかれる気配がありません！火葬場のサービスを受けられるのは最富裕層の市民のみで、残念ながら彼らはそう簡単には死にません。大体、次の遺体が運ばれるまでに商品を売りさばいています。ですが今回は本当にタイミングが悪くて…お願いします、どうか助けてください！」
languages.original_text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

traits.locale_text: 「ここ10年程あの中に商品を隠しています。今のところまったく気づかれる気配がありません！火葬場のサービスを受けられるのは最富裕層の市民のみで、残念ながら彼らはそう簡単には死にません。大体、次の遺体が運ばれるまでに商品を売りさばいています。ですが今回は本当にタイミングが悪くて…お願いします、どうか助けてください！」

languages.text: "Ich mache das schon seit zehn Jahren, sogar ziemlich erfolgreich, wenn ich das hinzufügen darf! Nur die wohlhabendsten Bürger können sich die Dienste eines Krematoriums leisten, und leider sterben sie gar nicht so häufig. Üblicherweise verkaufe ich die Ware, bevor die nächste Leiche eintrifft. Aber diesmal hatte ich Pech. Helft mir, ich flehe Euch an!"
languages.original_text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich mache das schon seit zehn Jahren, sogar ziemlich erfolgreich, wenn ich das hinzufügen darf! Nur die wohlhabendsten Bürger können sich die Dienste eines Krematoriums leisten, und leider sterben sie gar nicht so häufig. Üblicherweise verkaufe ich die Ware, bevor die nächste Leiche eintrifft. Aber diesmal hatte ich Pech. Helft mir, ich flehe Euch an!"

languages.text: « Voilà dix ans que je les cache à cet endroit, et jusqu'ici, je n'avais jamais eu de souci ! Seuls les citoyens les plus riches peuvent s'offrir les services d'un crématorium et, malheureusement, il n'en meurt pas tous les quatre matins. J'ai donc généralement le temps de vendre les marchandises avant l'arrivée du cadavre suivant. Mais cette fois, je n'ai vraiment pas eu de chance. Je vous en supplie, vous devez m'aider ! »
languages.original_text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

traits.locale_text: « Voilà dix ans que je les cache à cet endroit, et jusqu'ici, je n'avais jamais eu de souci ! Seuls les citoyens les plus riches peuvent s'offrir les services d'un crématorium et, malheureusement, il n'en meurt pas tous les quatre matins. J'ai donc généralement le temps de vendre les marchandises avant l'arrivée du cadavre suivant. Mais cette fois, je n'ai vraiment pas eu de chance. Je vous en supplie, vous devez m'aider ! »

languages.text: "Mallarımı on yıla yakın süredir orada saklarım, bir kişinin bile ruhu duymadı! Sadece çok zenginler krematoryum hizmetini karşılayabilir, maalesef onlar da sık ölmüyor. Genelde yeni naaş gelmeden elimdeki malları satarım ama bu sefer şansım yaver gitmedi işte. Bana yardım edin, yalvarırım!"
languages.original_text: "I've been hiding them there for ten years now, and quite successfully, I might add! Only the richest citizens can afford the services of a crematorium, and, sadly, they don't die all that often. Usually I sell the goods before the next body arrives. But I got unlucky this time. Help me, I beg of you!"

traits.locale_text: "On yıla yakın süredir orada saklıyordum, hem de kimsenin ruhu duymadı! Sadece çok zengin yurttaşlar krematoryum hizmetini karşılayabiliyor ve maalesef onların da sık öldüğü söylenemez. Genelde malları diğer naaş gelmeden satmış oluyorum ama bu sefer şansım yaver gitmedi. Bana yardım edin, yalvarırım!"
